title: Knotted by the Fae
description: He'll make me his plaything...LilyHot, surly, growly Fae male,Gabriel, kidnapped me to get the attention of the Fae Corps.He soul bonded me.Knotted me...Mated me without my consent.He demands that I obey him.I am determined to resist him.He will not stop until he's tamed my spirit.I will not succumb to his seductive charms,The pleasure he wrings from my body...I cannot, will not give in to him...I hopeThis is Gabriel and Lily's story.Hot Dark Fae abduction romance, starring a feisty virgin human and the Fae male strong enough to make her his! 1-Click Now
author: Laxmi Hariharan
